Body:
"""
    Test of utils.dict_compare() function
    """
name1 = 'Dictionary 1'
name2 = 'Dictionary 2'
tol = 1e-05
comparison = utils.dict_compare(name1, a, name2, b, tol, verbose=True)
assert comparison
pytest.mark.parametrize('a,b', [(a1, b1), (a2, b2), (a3, b3)], ids=[
    'scalar', 'array', 'mix of scalar and array'])
